pages.text: The $(item)Grappling Hook Harness$() is the central part of a $(thing)Grappling Hook$(). $(br) Within the Harness the vital components $(thing)hook$(), $(thing)rope$() und $(thing)engine$() need to be present to work. $(br)The $(item)Harness$() can be worn in the Leg Slot, as Curio or simply carried in the inventory. Only one $(item)harness$() can be used/carried at once!
